markdownHeaderIndexer.levelBegin.description:
How many '#' are considered as first level index, larger than 0.
Default is 2.

markdownHeaderIndexer.levelEnd.description:
How many '#' are considered as max level index, larger than or equal to LevelBegin.
Default is 6.

markdownHeaderIndexer.levelPrefixAndPost.description:
Prefix and postfix for the first level and all other level indexes, separated and enclosed by '|'.
Usage: |first-level-prefix|first-level-postfix|other-level-prefix|other-level-postfix|

markdownHeaderIndexer.firstLevelIndex.description:
The characters used for the first level index. Predefined catalogs are 'ALPHABET', 'CHINESE', 'ROMAN' and 'DEFAULT' (or leave empty).
Usage: at least 10 characters, each separated and enclosed by '|'. 
Example: |a|b|c|d|e|f|g|h|i|j|

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
